rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with wide door for wheelchair accessibility and Vastu compliant entrance location.

rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Sufficient space to accommodate two vehicles with easy access from the driveway. Designed with ramps and wide openings for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area adjacent to the kitchen. Features ample natural light through north-facing windows in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Integrated with the living area for seamless interaction and designed to include wheelchair-friendly counters and appliances.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Living Room/Bedroom Combo
rooms.description: Multi-purpose room serving as both living and sleeping space on the ground floor for easy accessibility.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance door located on the north side for optimal Vastu alignment.

openings.name: Garage Access Door
openings.description: Door connecting to two-car garage, ensuring easy wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with ample natural light and privacy considerations.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Cozy study space designed to facilitate quiet work and reflection.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with proper grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

openings.name: Staircase to Ground Floor
openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible ramp included adjacent to the staircase for safe vertical movement between levels.
